About

Thanks for stopping by. Read below to learn more about myself and my background.

Background

I'm a UK based full stack web developer, currently commercially working with PHP, Laravel, wordpress technologies and an inquisitive mind.
Web developer with experience building for front-end and full stack. Passionate about creative design solutions and skilled in PHP, Laravel, Astro, React.js, Javascript, CSS frameworks (bootstrap/tailwind) for rapid build and redesign times, HTML accessibility standards, using and building RESTful API’s, Node.js & Express. Quick to “catch on”, determined breaker down of problems with a love for collaboration and a passion for continual learning.

🌱 I`m currently working at Digitronix, a full service agency where my respomnibilities include management and reporting for over 35 live client sites, building and deploying greenfield sites from in house figma / XD designs, adding feature requests to existing sites and onboarding the hosting and management of sites from new clients.

💬 Ask me about breathing (trust me, it's more complex than you know).
🐕 Papa to a rascally whippet.
⚡ Fun fact: Currently addicted to the 80's tv show "Starcade". Often found running the local hills and trails or bobbing about in the local lakes & rivers.

Assisting clients update wordpress sites, managing plug-ins and custom code using PHP / JS. Content creation for social media, websites. Managing social media accounts.

Managing social media accounts. Leading in-person workshops using the photomooch method. Chair to meetings / zoom calls. Writing grant applications, managing the process.

Building projects linking modern frontend technologies through custom coded restful API’s to a backend hosted database.
